view

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object

    UserController for the User sub-system. Controls all UI elements. Disables unusable buttons or hides them.

    Author:
    Kevin Slachta, Leon J Kim
